titleStmt.title: E[p]i[ph]ania, or, A discourse upon the manifestation of Christ to the gentiles by the appearance of a star by Francis Gregory, D.D. and rector of Hambleton in the county of Bucks.
titleStmt.author: Gregory, Francis.

notesStmt.note: Bracketed letters in title printed in Greek letters.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
